{{cpp/chrono/title|1=operator&lt;&lt;{{small|(std::chrono::year)}}}}
{{cpp/chrono/year/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=chrono|since=c++20|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os, const std::chrono::year&amp; y );
}}

Forms a {{c|std::basic_string&lt;CharT&gt;}} {{c|s}} consisting of the year value stored in {{c|y}} formatted as a decimal number, left-padded with {{c|0}} to four digits if the result would otherwise be less than four digits. Then, if {{c|!y.ok()}}, append {{c|" is not a valid year"}} to the formatted string. Inserts that string into {{c|os}}.

Equivalent to

{{cc|
return os &lt;&lt; (y.ok() ?
    std::format(STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:%Y}"), y) :
    std::format(STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:%Y} is not a valid year"), y));
}}

where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("...")}} is {{c|"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{tt|char}}, and {{c|L"..."}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{tt|wchar_t}}.

===Return value===
{{c|os}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    constexpr std::chrono::year y1{2020}, y2{-020}, y3{98304};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; y1 &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; y2 &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; y3 &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
2020
-0016
-32768 is not a valid year
}}
